This torrent works great!

How to install, this is what you need:
+       Warhammer_Dawn_of_War_2-WiCKED
+       1.5 Patch
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5051729/Dawn_of_War_2_1.5.0_Update
+       1.8 Patch
thepiratebay.se/torrent/5341342/Warhammer_40_000_Dawn_of_War_II_Patch_1.8

#1 - Install/or unrar your game.
#2 - Copy all 1.8 patch data into installation folder.
#3 - Extract all "RevLoader-2.2_New_DLLs" data from 1.5 patch into installation folder.

#4 - Play Dawn of War II 1.8(RevLoader 2.2).

Ps. Works on Windows 7 x64

/a fellow pirate
